#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define rep(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define max(a,b) ((a)<(b) ? (b) : (a))
int a[1000],n;
int main() {
    int ans = 0,i,j;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    rep(i,0,n) scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    sort(a,a+n);
    j = n/2;
    if(n&1) {
            ans += a[j+1] - a[j-1];
            rep(i,j+2,n) ans += 2*a[i];
            rep(i,0,j-1) ans -= 2*a[i];
            ans += max(a[j]-a[j-1],a[j+1]-a[j]);
    }
    else {
         ans += a[j] - a[j-1];
         rep(i,j+1,n) ans += 2*a[i];
         rep(i,0,j-1) ans -= 2*a[i];
    }
    printf("%d",ans);
    return 0;
}
